All Classes

Class Description
Action
Enumeration for the type of available actions.
AnsiCode  
Apollo
If a Player has Apollo, their Worker can move into an opponent worker's space (using normal movements rules) and swap their position.
Artemis
Player's Worker may move one additional time, but not back to the space it started on.
AskWorkersPosition
This message contains an array of coordinates (row1, column1, row2, column2) that indicates the initial positions of the worker of a specific player.
Athena
If Player's Worker moves up, all the other players cannot move up in their turns.
Atlas
Player's Worker may build a dome instead of the "following rules" level.
Board
This class represents the model of the board of the game, with inside it 25 slots, each one represented by the class Slot.
ChallengerController
This class is the controller of the challenger.fxml scene.
ChooseAction
This message contains the action and the direction which have been chosen by the player during the turn.
ChooseCardController
This class is the controller of the chooseCard.fxml scene.
ChoosePlayersController
This class is the controller of the choosePlayers.fxml scene.
ChooseWorkerByPosition
This message contains the coordinates who contains the worker that the player chose to use during a specific turn.
Chronus
With Chronus, Player can win also if there are 5 COMPLETE towers on the Board.
CLI  
Client
This class instantiates a thread for each client and handles the choice of the graphical interface and the Server the user wants to connect to.
ClientHandler
This class handles the connection and the communication between the server and a client.
ClientHandlerListener
This interface is implemented by the classes which want to listen to the ClientHandler.
ClientHandlerObservable
This class permits the ClientHandler to be observable.
ClientTimer
This class controls if the server is still connected to the network.
Color
Enumeration which represent the available colors.
ConnectionAccepted
This message contains the username and the color chosen by a player.
ConnectionFailed
This message contains an error of connection.
ConnectionToServerController  
ControllerVisitor
This class implements the Visitor interface referred to the Visitor pattern.
CurrentMoment
Enum used to distinguish inside the client where we are in the game, it is particularly important for the DuringGame part
Demeter
Player's Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.
Direction
Enumeration which represents the possible direction that can be chosen by a player.
DuringGameController
This class is used to separate from the Gui class the logic of the game, based on which moment we are in the game, it displays different texts to give instructions and reacts to the user inputs differently from the Gui it receives the GameView, in which all information about the game and current moment are stored
ErrorMessage
This
FirstConnection
This method contains the username and the color chosen by the player who connected first.
Game
This class contains all the elements of a game.
GameController
This class represents the controller of the game.
GameServer
This class represents each game saved in the server.
GameView
This class stores in the client some basic information of the model that the view needs in order to interact with the user
Gender
Enumeration which represents the possible genders of a worker.
God
This class is a skeleton to be implemented when gods are added.
GodChosen
This message contains the god chosen by a player.
GodName
Enumerations which represents all the available gods.
GUI
This class is used to change what the user will see and updates the current scene It is only used for the graphic part, which means display and change of scene layout
Hephaestus
Player's Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.
Hera
If a Player has Hera, the opponents' Worker cannot win by moving into a perimeter slot.
Hestia
If a Player has Hestia, their Worker can build a second time, but this second construction cannot be on a perimeter slot.
ImportantMessage
This message contains a generic information about the state of the game.
InvalidBuildException  
InvalidDirectionException  
InvalidMoveException  
Level
Enumeration which represents the possible levels that can be built during the game.
ListOfGods
This message contains the list of gods available during the game.
Message
This class represents a message which can be sent from the server to the client or the other way around.
MessageType
Enumeration which represents all the message to send during the game.
Minotaur
Player's Worker may move into an opponent worker's Slot (using normal movements rules), if the next slot in the same direction is unoccupied.
NetworkConnectionUtil  
NetworkHandler
This class handles the transfer of messages between the client and the server.
NetworkHandlerVisitor
This class implements the Visitor interface referred to the Visitor pattern.
NewPosition  
Pan
Player can win also if his Worker moves down two or more levels.
Ping
This message contains a ping.
Player
This class represents the user.
PlayerParameters
This class is a tuple with a username and a color.
PlayersNumber
This message contains the numberOfPlayers of the game.
PrintSupport  
Prometheus
If Player's Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.
PublicInformation
This message contains all the informations about the players of the game: their usernames, their colors and the gods they had chosen.
RequestPlayersNumber
This message contains the number of players of the game.
Server
This class wait for connections with clients and handles connections and disconnections, creating or deleting the game.
ServerTimer
This class controls if the client is still connected to the network.
Slot
This class represent a slot of the board.
SlotListener
Observer interface of the Pattern observer.
SlotObservable  
StartController
This class is the controller of the startPane.fxml scene.
StartServer
This class instantiates a new server.
Triton
If Player's Worker moves onto a perimeter space (ground or block) , it may immediately move again.
Turn
This class implements all the element of a turn game.
TurnController
This class represents the controller of a turn.
UpdatedSlot
This message contains an update from the model (a modified slot).
View  
ViewListener
Observer interface of the Pattern observer.
ViewObservable
Observable interface of pattern observer.
VirtualView
This class implements a virtualView, which basically represents the connection between the network and the controller.
VirtualViewListener
This class implements the Observer interface of the Observer Pattern.
VirtualViewObservable
This class permits the VirtualView to be observable.
Visitable  
VisitableActionAndDirection
This class implements the Visitable interface of the Visitor pattern.
VisitableGod
This class implements the Visitable interface of the Visitor pattern.
VisitableInformation
This class implements the Visitable interface of the Visitor pattern.
VisitableInitialPositions
This class implements the Visitable interface of the Visitor pattern.
VisitableInt
This class implements the Visitable interface of the Visitor pattern.
VisitableListOfGods
This class implements the Visitable interface of the Visitor pattern.
VisitableMessage
This abstract class contains the method getContent which must be present in each Message that contains a Visitable attribute.
VisitableRowsAndColumns
This class implements the Visitable interface of the Visitor pattern.
Visitor  
Worker  
WrongParameters
This message contains the request of new parameters as they have already been used by someone else.
YouAreTheChallenger
This message is sent only to the player who has been chosen to be the Challenger to inform him.
Zeus
Player's Worker may also choose to build under himself and so add another level on his/her current Slot.
